name: THE PURSUIT OF HOBBYNESS
description: The Pursuit of Hobbyness is an innovative web application designed to inspire users in discovering and embracing new hobbies.This platform serves as a digital incubator for dreams and aspirations through hobby exploration.

name: HAPPYFIIT
description: HappyFiit is a comprehensive fitness application crafted to cater fitness for everyone by providing an array of resources and tools. It was built using React, Node.js and deployed through Netlify.

name: WORKDAY-PLANNER
description: An application designed for organizing a workday schedule from 9 AM to 5 PM, featuring automatic day and time updates using jQuery and Day.js.

name: 5DAYS-WEATHER-TRACKER
description: The 5-day Weather Dashboard application offers users current weather conditions and a five-day forecast for searched cities, utilizing Bootstrap for UI, jQuery for data manipulation, and server APIs from OpenWeatherMap for fetching weather data

name: PASSWORD GENERATOR
description: The application demonstrates core JavaScript techniques—functions, loops, arrays, and conditional logic—to build a dynamic password generator that tailors unique passwords to user-defined criteria, showcasing practical web development skills.

name: A-DENTISTRY-QUIZ-GAME
description: An interactive quiz application that allows users to complete a quiz, see their scores, and compare them with previous highscores. It incorporates timers, local storage for data retrieval, event listeners, and dynamic content manipulation

name: BOOTSTRAP-PORTFOLIO
description: This portfolio page combines navigation, hero, projects, skills, and contact sections, enhanced by CSS and Bootstrap components for a dynamic, responsive layout.

name: TEAM-PROFILE-GENERATOR
description: The Command Line Team Profile Generator is a user-friendly application that creates professional team profile pages via CLI prompts. It gathers employee details and generates a polished HTML interface to display the team profiles efficiently.

name: GUESS-CLICK-GAME
description: This captivating game leverages the power of React to create a dynamic and responsive user experience. The seamless score updates, randomized image arrangements, and top score tracking are all dynamically managed through React's efficient use of hooks, props, and components
